title: Video: My Panda Shall Fly ft. Adventure Elephant – Opening Embrace
body:
Today’s feeling more and more loved up as more and more fantastic bits drop into our inbox.

**Noisey** have just premiered the new video for **My Panda Shall Fly** track, _Opening Embrace_. A vaguely dark, highly stylised and surreal introduction to the world of My Panda. It’s stomach churning at times, extremely awkward and yet utterly transfixing. Hit play below.

Directed by **Chris Toumazou.**

**My Panda Shall Fly & Adventure Elephant’s**, “_Maccron Accent,_” to be released March 25th, 2013 by [Tape Club Records](http://www.tapeclubrecords.com/).
